Articles.Content:
So I have got some ships into space but I have aways installed rechargeable batteries on them. But i have always noticed people have large solar arrays on their stations and i would like to know how i would go about building one of those arrays. :confused::confused::confused:

Edited June 1, 2013 by gmister88

Do you mean sorta like this:?

There are some mods for other solar panels, but I don't have any experience with those.

The biiig solar panel, bigger than the gigantor spammed on Uberick's post, is the Balka. Available in the Kosmos space station pack. Right now i think the animation is broken with the arrival of version 0.20

The half one still works though.

It's an impressive piece to put on a ship, and kinda fragile. It's made for a station.
Yes just like those, thanks for the help
Did you build this piece by piece in space?

Those solar panels are able to retract and extend. I experimented on the surface. They are so fragile that all of them will fracture with the slowest airflow on surface. So, only extend them in space.
